BriefDescription: Percentage of cycles that are run cycles
Average cycles per completed instruction
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled for any reason
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled because there was a flush
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled because Fetch was being held,  so there was nothing in the pipeline for this thread
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled because the MMU was handling a translation miss
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled waiting to resolve an instruction ERAT miss
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled waiting to resolve an instruction TLB miss
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled due to an icache miss
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled while the instruction was fetched from the local L2
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled while the instruction was fetched from the local L3
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled while the instruction was fetched from any source beyond the local L3
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled due to an icache miss after a branch mispredict
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled while instruction was fetched from the local L2 after suffering a branch mispredict
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled while instruction was fetched from the local L3 after suffering a branch mispredict
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled while instruction was fetched from any source beyond the local L3 after suffering a branch mispredict
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled due to a branch mispredict
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction was held at dispatch for any reason
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction was held at dispatch because of a synchronizing instruction that requires the ICT to be empty before dispatch
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction was held at dispatch while waiting on the scoreboard
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction was held at dispatch due to issue queue full
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction was held at dispatch because the mapper/SRB was full
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction was held at dispatch because the STF mapper/SRB was full
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction was held at dispatch because the XVFC mapper/SRB was full
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction was held at dispatch for any other reason
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction has been dispatched but not issued for any reason
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting to be finished in one of the execution units
Average cycles per completed instruction spent executing an NTC instruction that gets flushed some time after dispatch
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTF instruction finishes at dispatch
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is executing in the branch unit
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is a simple fixed point instruction that is executing in the LSU
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is executing in the VSU
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting to be finished in one of the execution units
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is a load or store that suffered a translation miss
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is recovering from a TLB miss
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is executing in the LSU
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is a load that is executing in the LSU
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting for a load miss to resolve from either the local L2 or local L3
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting for a load miss to resolve from either the local L2 or local L3, with an RC dispatch conflict
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting for a load miss to resolve from either the local L2 or local L3, without an RC dispatch conflict
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting for a load miss to resolve from a source beyond the local L2 and local L3
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting for a load miss to resolve from a neighbor chiplet's L2 or L3 in the same chip
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting for a load miss to resolve from L4, local memory or OpenCAPI chip
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting for a load miss to resolve from a remote chip (cache, L4, memory or OpenCAPI) in the same group
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is waiting for a load miss to resolve from a distant chip (cache, L4, memory or OpenCAPI chip)
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is executing a TLBIEL instruction

Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is finishing a load after its data has been reloaded from a data source beyond the local L1, OR when the LSU is processing an L1-hit, OR when the NTF instruction merged with another load in the LMQ
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is a store that is executing in the LSU
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is in the store unit outside of handling store misses or other special store operations
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is a store whose cache line was not resident in the L1 and had to wait for allocation of the missing line into the L1
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is a TLBIE instruction waiting for a response from the L2
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is executing a PTESYNC instruction
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction cannot complete because the thread was blocked
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction cannot complete because it was interrupted by ANY exception

Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is stuck at finish waiting for the non-speculative finish of either a STCX instruction waiting for its result or a load waiting for non-critical sectors of data and ECC
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is a STCX instruction waiting for resolution from the nest
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is a LWSYNC instruction waiting to complete
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction is a HWSYNC instruction stuck at finish waiting for a response from the L2
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction required special handling before completion
Average cycles per completed instruction when dispatch was stalled because fetch was being held, so there was nothing in the pipeline for this thread
Average cycles per completed instruction when the NTC instruction was held at dispatch because of power management
